reviewText: I really like this dvd  I want to help young adults improve their lives and to make better choices Great

I have used this for a juvenile justice class--I think its an excellent view of 4 different minors with issues that are complex and need to be addressed---poverty,mental illness, risky behavior, abandonment by parents.

I AM A POLICE OFFICER WHO WORKS IN THE HIGH SCHOOLS TEACHING THEM ABOUT DRUGS, ALCOHOL, BULLYING, DATING VIOLENCE...ETC. AND  I'VE BEEN TRYING TO GET VIDEOS ON JUVENILES GOING TO PRISON, SO I PURCHASED SOME VIDEOS ON SCARED STRAIGHT WHICH WERE GOOD, HOWEVER THIS VIDEO WAS SO BORING I ONLY WATCHED THE FIRST 5 MINUTES AND HAD TO RETURN IT....NO IMPACT WHATSOEVER......
